doc.title: Beyoglu esrari
doc.plot: Osman a handsome cab driver, is in love with Selma who works at a gas station. They have not yet revealed their feelings to each other. Selma wants to become a theater actress. Osman is the driver of Jale, a woman working in a bar. Jale and her lover Rifat rob a jeweler and commit a murder. They want to put the blame on Osman. Jale's dead body is found in the car. Osman gets to Rifat's house and has a row with a gang member of Turgut's. Rifat is about to leave the country. Selma and Osman run away, they find Rifat. Rifat wants to kill Selma. Turgut's men and Osman are after Rifat. Selma informs the police. Osman finds Rifat, confesses everything and is arrested. The two lovers now unite.
